title: Ill Met by a Fish Shop on George Street
description: This may be the limit of the author's penchant for weird titles. In this story, a fugitive who has lived a blameless life in Australia for thirty years suddenly comes face to face with the one man who can destroy him. The two men stalk each other, and their confrontation has a sudden but believable surprise ending. A murderous black comedy.
author: Mark McShane
